text: We winaq riꞌ man xkiqꞌijilaꞌj ta wi ri e bꞌanom taq tyox, xuqujeꞌ qas xjeqiꞌ wi kikꞌuꞌx rukꞌ ri Dios, man xkibꞌan ta wi mak kukꞌ achyabꞌ xuqujeꞌ kukꞌ ixoqibꞌ, are waꞌ ri keteriꞌ na chirij ri alaj Chij japawjeꞌ ri keꞌ wi. Are waꞌ ri e nabꞌe winaq ri xekolotajik rech jeriꞌ ketzuj cho ri Dios xuqujeꞌ cho ri alaj Chij.
